Zelda.audio.soundpack¶

Zelda.audio.soundpack.SoundPack¶

This module is used to operate with soundpacks.

class Zelda.audio.soundpack.SoundPack.MusicPack(music: dict[str, str], volume)[source]¶

Bases: object

MusicPack class.

pause()[source]¶

Pause the music.

Play the music file with the name name.

Parameters:

name – name of music

Returns:

Stop the music.

Unpause the music.

Update music volume of the game.

Parameters:

volume – new music value

Returns:

Bases: object

SoundPack class.
